Content: A strong wind that blew across three villages of Polonnaruwa, Dimbulagala Divisional Secretariat area has damaged several houses. The wind which blew across Nidanwela, Ihala-wewa and Divuldamana villages in the Dimbulagala Divisional Secretariat area has damaged 50 houses. Officials of the Divisional Secretariat, Grama Niladhari Officers and the District Disaster Management Centre took steps provide relief for the affected people. The Government Agent has instructed the officials of the District Secretariat to provide relief immediately to the disaster affected people.
